{"games":[{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":781121,"totalDownVotes":56727,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":77117,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1501767,"totalDownVotes":169945,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":244465,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.

RP Set- A term used to identify a house or structure that has a central theme that can be more specifically roleplayed with. It will be marked different than a normal house.

Thanks for playing!","genre":""},{"creatorId":10249200,"creatorName":"Albatross Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":213539,"totalDownVotes":4565,"universeId":2655311011,"name":"🌌 Anime Dimensions","placeId":6938803436,"playerCount":49388,"imageToken":"T_6938803436_f06e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"📢New Code at 225,000 Likes!

🔨Builder: @d5no_","genre":""},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4503993,"totalDownVotes":858173,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":129328,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Careers, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Credits: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/am/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4050742,"totalDownVotes":336932,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":61960,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":627236,"totalDownVotes":44860,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":33873,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

If you've played SkyWars before, you'll pickup BedWars in no time!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4478839,"totalDownVotes":606357,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":23583,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"July Update coming soon!

🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":5273516,"creatorName":"The Gang Stockholm","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":76146,"totalDownVotes":4775,"universeId":2564505263,"name":"[Update 5] Strongman Simulator","placeId":6766156863,"playerCount":42992,"imageToken":"T_6766156863_1a39","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💪Welcome to Strongman Simulator!💪

Follow @TheGangSthlm on Twitter for codes!","genre":""},{"creatorId":10960525,"creatorName":"Whacky Wizards","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":89153,"totalDownVotes":7934,"universeId":2628404708,"name":"Wacky Wizards | BOSS 🔥","placeId":6888253864,"playerCount":42049,"imageToken":"T_6888253864_57d5","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥UPDATES🔥

And join our Roblox group/community!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":760740,"totalDownVotes":99577,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands ✨ [SPIRIT ISLAND!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":20246,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌲 Build your own island

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":335888,"totalDownVotes":173018,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":24289,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2348703,"totalDownVotes":712107,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":44537,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?

For support go to support.yx.zone","genre":""},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":617735,"totalDownVotes":46118,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":18713,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"In this world, no one can survive alone. Google "TDS Wiki" for in-depth game info!","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1549190,"totalDownVotes":127377,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":24966,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":4516503,"creatorName":"A Bizarre Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":232216,"totalDownVotes":43001,"universeId":969567031,"name":"A Bizarre Day [GOLDEN KARS + MORE]","placeId":2686500207,"playerCount":8321,"imageToken":"T_2686500207_bfb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"This game is not compatible with Console or Mobile devices. Most voicelines are from Eyes of Heaven, All Star Battle and Heritage for the Future.","genre":""},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":216173,"totalDownVotes":10896,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[🤝UPDATE 3.5] Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":7890,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure experience. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu

Check out the social links down below the description! And follow the game while you're at it c:

Controls:
1-9 = Activate/Deactivate your weapon.
X = Toggle sprint.
Q = Punch/Kick, gives a single experience point.
T = Block, duration increases based on Durability.
M = Equip/Unequip Mask
Click = Attack
E = Special 1
R = Special 2
F = Special 3
C = Bonus Special
0 = Arata (CCG Team)
G = Kakuhou Special/Quinx
Double tap (W/A/S/D) to evade.

Do not trust any other 'Ro-Ghoul' copies on roblox! Those games may threaten your account! Be safe out there (:
